lines.name: Commander Ives
lines.text: He may be your older brother, but you gotta job to do.

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: Richmond's not my older brother. Parents never said who was the oldest twin. So-

lines.name: Commander Ives
lines.text: Don't give me shit Taylor. I'm leveling with you. There might not be anything left of A.E.R.O.'s Genesis Crew. But none of us survive if you don't come back with that plant.

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: I know! I'm worried. Hell, I'm scared. I'm...You know, I love red velvet cupcakes. Least you could do, considering I'm saving the world.

lines.name: Commander Ives
lines.text: (sigh) The ARK's depending on you. Don't die on me Taylor.

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: Copy that sir. Hadn't planned on it.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor - Mission Log
lines.text: Ceres’ atmosphere. Only a few clicks on the chemistry dial from breathable. Somethin' tells me A.E.R.O. already knew that…

lines.name: Richmond Taylor - Mission Log
lines.text: The Fireglass Orchid, the ARK's blessed lord and oxygen savior. If the scientist are right, it's a band-aid on a bullet hole keeping the ARK afloat.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor - Mission Log
lines.text: Ceres in one word - resilient. A.E.R.O. thinks the orchid formed out of planetary distress. She’s trying to heal.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor - Mission Log
lines.text: ARK’s O2 only as good as fresh shit on a Sunday. But the air pockets on Ceres (whistle) like it's 'posed to have fresh air.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor - Mission Log
lines.text: Damn. Animals. Got pissier than a cricket’s whisker when I plucked a flower. Miles sure came in handy. Animals. Actual animals.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor - Mission Log
lines.text: Orchid’s only giving us a couple hundred years ‘fore we breathe it dry. The ARK’s a lifeboat. We need a home.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor - Mission Log
lines.text: Found the orchid. Ever since, things went haywire. Storm’s a brewing. Gettin’ here was easy. Leavin’ might be hard.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor - Mission Log
lines.text: Mission success means A.E.R.O. hits the bullseye on survival. Only thing - the target’s a couple hundred asteroids shy of living.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor - Mission Log
lines.text: Lesson numero uno aboard the ARK: Earth burned. Nobody says who lit the match, but I think Ceres rose from the ashes.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor - Mission Log
lines.text: I seen her - the orchid. Only would take a small bit to light up the ARK’s greenhouses. If we give it a chance, Ceres could be home again.

dialogues.name: Roanoke Finds Richmond - V1 Richmond Lives - PT1

lines.name: Richmond Taylor
lines.text: (deep inhale) Like giving an ice bath to a glass a water.

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: That good huh?

lines.name: Richmond Taylor
lines.text: Orchid?

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: Came to you first, and good thing.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor
lines.text: Here. You always been the better shot.

dialogues.name: Roanoke Finds Richmond - V1 Richmond Lives - PT2

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: Even with a full tank, it may not be enough.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor
lines.text: Orchid's givin' off pure O2, depletes slower. We gotta move, but it's possible.

dialogues.name: Roanoke Finds Richmond - V2 Richmond Dies - PT1

lines.name: Richmond Taylor
lines.text: (strangled breath) It’s your mission.

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: Don’t do that.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor
lines.text: Take this. Damn it, Roanoke! Take it. (cough)

dialogues.name: Roanoke Finds Richmond - V2 Richmond Dies - PT2

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: My O2 tank. There’s enough-

lines.name: Richmond Taylor
lines.text: Ro, get to the orchid. It’s pure O2. Depletes slower. It’s enough to get you back.

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: But-

lines.name: Richmond Taylor
lines.text: Roanoke. (labored breathing)

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: We’ll never find out who’s older.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor
lines.text: Love you little sis.

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: Love you too. Big bro.

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: Agent Echo Six Lima. Reporting-

lines.name: Commander Ives
lines.text: Ro?! Damn, it's good to hear your voice.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor
lines.text: Me too sir?

lines.name: Commander Ives
lines.text: Richmond? Glad you’re coming home.

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: Plant’s secure.

lines.name: Commander Ives
lines.text: You're getting that red velvet.

lines.name: Richmond Taylor
lines.text: My favorite.

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: Let's debrief when we're back. We got questions.

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: Agent Echo Six Lima-

lines.name: Commander Ives
lines.text: Ro?! Damn, it's good to hear your voice.

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: Plant's secure.

lines.name: Commander Ives
lines.text: Genesis Crew?

lines.name: Roanoke Taylore
lines.text: (sniffle) Negative.

lines.name: Commander Ives
lines.text: Shit. Rich was a good one.

lines.name: Roanoke Taylor
lines.text: The best.

lines.name: Commander Ives
lines.text: I'm glad you're coming home Taylor.
